# Revolutionary Socialist Party (Leninist)

The Revolutionary Socialist Party (Leninist) RSP(L) is a regional party in the state of Kerala formed in 2016. The party leader is Kovoor Kunjumon representing Kunnathoor assembly constituency in Kerala Legislative Assembly is the part of LDF.
References
See also
* [http://www.clips9.com/files/2016/01/rsp-mla-kovoor-kunjumon-r/k6hrhwC18-k.html RSP MLA Kovoor Kunjumon]
